thread.title: Can you remember the movies based on the leading characters' names?
thread.title_full: Can you remember the movies based on the leading characters' names?

title: Can you remember the movies based on the leading characters' names?
text:
Can you remember the movies based on the leading characters' names? Can you remember the movies based on the leading characters' names? 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
In little over 90 minutes, movie makers have us rooting for the girl and guy to get together or call it quits, but while we might fall in love with the movie, do the characters’ names stick in our head? 
We’ve boiled down 14 films to the names of the characters at the heart of the love story in the movie. 
Can you identify them? As an extra clue, all of the films have been released since 2000. Share article
